Processing Methods:

  • aspect_scale(): Get scaled image dimensions while retaining aspect ratio.

  • load_images(): Compute and load rescaled images as pygame surfaces.

  • set_display(): Set pygame display object tooptimise images towards.

Sanity Check Methods:

  • is_image_file(): Check if a given file is a valid image file.

  • is_valid_animation(): Check if a given path is a valid animation directory.

IO Methods:

  • add_animations(): Get scaled image dimensions while retaining aspect ratio.

  • add_and_load_animations(): Load and add animations from a path.

  • add_single_subanimation(): Add a single sub-animation into path lib without loading it.

  • add_and_load_single_subanimation(): Add and load a single sub-animation.

Animation Management Methods:

  • load_animations(): Load all animations in the path lib into the frame lib.

  • load_animation(): Load an animation in the path lib into the frame lib.

  • unload_animation(): Unload a single animation’s frame images to clear memory.

  • unload_animations(): Unload animation frame images to clear memory.

  • remove_animation(): Remove a single animation from the frame and path libraries.

  • remove_animations(): Remove animations from the frame and path libraries.

  • create_animation(): Create and configure a playable TomoAnimation.

  • update_animation(): Update an animation while preserving its sequence and state.

Private Methods:

  • _optimise_animation(): Optimise image format for an animation’s images.

  • _load_animation(): Load an animation in the path lib into the frame lib.

  • _parse_animation_path(): Parse all valid animation paths in a directory as a dict.

  • _generate_playback_list(): Parse playback file and generate playback list.
